vulnerability.name: USN-4011-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4011-1 fixed several vulnerabilities in Jinja2. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM  and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Olivier Dony discovered that Jinja incorrectly handled str.format. An  attacker could possibly use this issue to escape the sandbox.  (CVE-2016-10745)   Brian Welch discovered that Jinja incorrectly handled str.format_map. An  attacker could possibly use this issue to escape the sandbox.  (CVE-2019-10906)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in Jinja2. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
